attributes.review: This app is terrible. I tried to see what our president had planned but he must have had some libtards make it because it won’t stop crashing. Overall its a bad app. I want who made this app deported.
attributes.title: Crashing

attributes.review: I tried downloading the app and it took hours when it finally downloaded I opened it and it I saw a very disturbing picture of trumps nudity I am scared for my life I have now blessed my eyes with holy water n hopefully the image is erases
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Upon opening the app I’ve noticed that everything was hard to navigate. The app was so cluttered and when I opened the app it was laggy and I couldn’t use it. Pls make someone delete this app.
attributes.title: Dissatisfied

attributes.review: This app is a DISGRACE to the Apple Store! It lags and makes my phone crash! I am giving a one star review also for how non user friendly it is. I am disappointed in this app and DO NOT wish to see it on the App Store EVER AGAIN!
attributes.title: EXTREMELY Disappointed!!!

attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with the news since I only trust trump. However, it kept crashing my phone!! I cannot believe our president would allow such an app to represent him!
attributes.title: Crashed

attributes.review: The app took 4 years to download. I opened up the app and my phone turned into a racist. I do not recommend this app to anyone. We should definitely not support this disgusting man behind it either.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This was absolutely terrible I think it’s broken when I opened all I saw was something orange with fur and all the sentences were wrong the words did make sense and they were out of order 😔do not use
attributes.title: 🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️

attributes.review: Never have I ever hated an app so much 🥰 The entire thing was tacky and the annoying orange Cheeto was everywhere which made it extremely unappealing. Overall 0/10. It sucked. Absolutely awful. Worst decision ever (just like bunker boy). 🥰❤️✨😌
attributes.title: It’s just awful

attributes.review: I do not recommend. I open up the app and the first thing that popped up was a big ol’ puff Cheeto in a suit. Why? Is this some sort of prank? Very disappointed. 0/10. Would give it zero stars if possible.
attributes.title: Horrible. Is this a joke?

attributes.review: I used a lot of presidential apps, all the apps, the best apps. This has to be the WORST, app I’ve ever used. The information it supplies it, well it doesn’t supply much information, it supplies no information actually. I’d rather play Flappy Bird.
attributes.title: The Worst App Out of Any Presidential App, Ever.
